summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Aadhaar Intelligence Console. All backend APIs working correctly with empty data handling. Frontend renders all 4 modules properly with professional government-style design.

ui_bugs.issue: Minor dropdown interaction issue - clicking 'All States' option has overlay interception

passed_tests: All 5 backend API endpoints return correct status codes
Empty data handling works correctly across all APIs
Frontend loads and renders all 4 modules successfully
Trend Engine displays metric cards and state selector
Anomaly Engine shows scatter plot and top 5 tables
Prediction Engine displays chart with forecast legend
Decision Dashboard shows summary cards and recommendations
Professional government-style design with proper spacing
All data-testid attributes present for testing
Color scheme appropriate for government application
